name: Mental Health Referral Line
description: SF DPH assists people with Medi-Cal benefits with finding affordable mental healthcare by providing a list of mental health clinics or private providers in San Francisco that charge either no fee, with a minimum share of cost, or based on a sliding scale.
fullDescription: SF DPH assists people with Medi-Cal benefits with finding affordable mental healthcare by providing a list of mental health clinics or private providers in San Francisco that charge either no fee, with a minimum share of cost, or based on a sliding scale.
whatTheyOffer: SF DPH assists people with Medi-Cal benefits with finding affordable mental healthcare by providing a list of mental health clinics or private providers in San Francisco that charge either no fee, with a minimum share of cost, or based on a sliding scale.
howToGetIt: To get assistance, you can either: - Call their 24-hour helpline at (888) 246-3333, TDD (888) 484-7200 - Drop in at the Behavioral Health Access Center (BHAC) - Address: 1380 Howard Street, 1st Floor (at 10th Street); San Francisco, CA 94103 - Open Hours: Monday to Friday, 8 am to 5 pm For general information and appointments, call 415-503-4730.
agency: San Francisco Department of Public Health
